description:
The official Jude Bellingham app has arrived.  
Step into the world of Jude Bellingham like never before with his brand-new, free official app.  

Whether you're a lifelong fan or just discovering Jude’s journey, this app brings you exclusive behind-the-scenes content, real-time match updates, and in-game stats straight from the pitch.  

Key features: 
•	Exclusive content – Access behind-the-scenes footage of Jude’s life away from the spotlight.  
•	Matches - Receive real-time match updates, Jude’s upcoming fixtures and in-game stats. 
•	Partnerships – Discover Jude’s latest brand collabs and shop his official merchandise all in one place. 
•	Videos – View interviews, training clips and personal moments you won’t find anywhere else. 
•	Jude’s Journey – Relive the highlights, key milestones and unforgettable moments of Jude’s career so far. 
•	Multi-language – Enjoy a seamless experience in your preferred language – choose from English, French, German, Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese. 

Wherever you are in the world, the Jude Bellingham app puts you at the heart of his story.  

Download now and stay connected to every moment.

Betway is the premier sports betting app, giving you lightning-fast access to the events that matter to you. Make real money bets on every goal, every score, every race, and every point with Betway. Step into the world of Betway Sports and feel the thrill from the start. New customers can unlock exclusive welcome bonuses* and exciting offers crafted to kickstart your journey.

We offer thousands of odds, across hundreds of events every single day, with both pre-match and live betting options across such popular sports as:
• Football betting
• Horse racing betting
• Tennis betting
• Cricket betting
• Rugby betting
• Golf betting
• Basketball betting
• Hockey betting
• Darts, Cycling, UFC, Martial Arts / MMA, American Football, among many others.

Enjoy betting on all major sports leagues in the world, including: English Premier League (EPL), La Liga, Bundesliga, UEFA Champions League, Serie A, Indian Premier League (IPL), National Football League (NFL), National Basketball Association (NBA), Major League Baseball (MLB), and National Hockey League (NHL).

Betway is the official sports betting partner of Premier League football clubs Arsenal, Manchester City, Chelsea, and Brighton & Hove Albion.


BEST ODDS ON FOOTBALL MARKETS

With Betway Sports betting app, everything you need to bet on the beautiful game is available at the end of your fingertips.

We’re at the heart of the world’s biggest and best domestic football competition, offering hundreds of thousands of odds and markets across all matches in this season’s tournaments.

Our online football betting markets are available pre-match and live in-play, letting you follow the momentum of every match closer than ever.
We have classic markets such as Correct Score and Win/Draw/Win, through to Goal Scorer, Card betting, and Handicap markets, ensuring you always get the best odds available to bet on.


BETWAY BET BUILDER

For sports betting that combines multiple markets, there’s the Betway Bet Builder. With the Betway Bet Builder, you can create personalised bets either pre-game or live in-play, by combining the markets that you want to bet on.

We have thousands of sports odds available at the touch of a button, meaning there’s always a market available for what you want to bet on.

And if you’re unsure what combinations to make, then you can bet on pre-built markets that mix Goals, Goalscorers, Cards, Corners, and more into one overall bet.


BETWAY FREE BET CLUB

Join Betway’s exclusive club where you can receive up to £10 in Free Bets every week! By spending £25 or more on whatever sports you fancy you will receive 2x£5 Free Bets!


*Full T&Cs apply and additional terms apply: https://sports.betway.com/en/sports/dyn/SportsWelcomeBonus

This is a real money gambling app. 18+. Please gamble responsibly and only bet what you can afford. If you or someone you know has a gambling problem, please call 0808 8020 133 or visit www.begambleaware.org.

description:
The new Premier League App provides real-time access to every score,
stat & story from the most watched football league in the world.


Follow the action live with Matchday Live, featuring verified live scores,
stats and stories from every match; Discover more with the PL Companion;
and Join myPremierLeague to personalise the App to the Matches, Players
and Clubs that matter most to you, play Fantasy Premier League, listen to
Premier League Radio, and watch every Premier League match ever played.


Follow live, get closer to the Premier League’s Clubs and Players, and shape

Follow every game with Matchday Live:
Verified live scores, statistics and table updates,
including links to watch official broadcasts live
wherever you are

Don’t miss a moment with Matchday Stories:
Vertical storytelling of every match from every
ground as it happens

Personalise your app with myPremierLeague:
Follow the players, Clubs and matches that
matter most to you

Listen live with Premier League Radio:
All the action as it happens from around the
Premier League (excl. UK and Ireland)

The world’s biggest fantasy football game,
in Classic, Draft and Challenge format

Including video, statistics and kits since 1992

Discover clubs and players:
Get closer with behind the scenes stories

description:
****Hryfine bracelets are non-medical devices. The measurement data and results are for reference only, not for diagnosis and treatment. * * * * *

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

Watch Football TV live or on-demand across multiple devices so you can tune in at home or on the go. 

Football TV Live app includes livestream, soccer highlights, daily sport news, match previews & predictions. 
You can watch all football matches of all country leagues, Europe, UK, USA Sport, Europa League, Champions League, Asian Sport and much more on your mobile device.

WATCH FOOTBALL THE WAY YOU LOVE IT

• Everything streams at the best quality your device can handle, up to HD
• Football includes all main leagues live
• Sports online on your mobile and tablet. Anytime. Anywhere.

Privacy Policy Consent
By installing this app you agree to the privacy policy

À l'occasion des événements sportifs au Maroc, un écosystème numérique innovant a été développé pour offrir aux supporters, visiteurs, volontaires et organisateurs une expérience 100% digitalisée. L'application YALLA est le compagnon de l'ensemble des grands événements sportifs organisés ou coorganisé par la Fédération Royale Marocaine du Football au Maroc.
YALLA offre la possibilité de :
- Créer et gérer le FAN ID, indispensable pour accéder aux stades et Fan Zones
- Déposer une demande d'e-Visa en ligne si nécessaire.
- Accéder aux actualités, programmes et informations pratiques liées aux événements sportifs.
- Consulter les services liés à l'organisation : transport, hébergement et activités.
- Rester informé en temps réel des mises à jour officielles.
YALLA centralise tous les services numériques afin que chaque participant profite pleinement des compétitions sportives au Maroc.

With the CricFy TV : Live Score Football app, you can stay updated with soccer live scores and stats, match highlights, and league standings at no cost. We cover matches from the Premier League to the World Cup, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action!

Get real-time score updates, detailed match stats, team standings, and more on your mobile device with our comprehensive football app.

CricFy TV : Live Score gives you access to a world of football, from live scores to in-depth league tables, team statistics, and match results. Discover matches and get detailed stats and live match scores on every game.

WHY CricFy TV : Live Score FOR FOOTBALL FANS?
- Live Sports Scores: Stay updated with real-time scores from matches around the world
- League Standings: View complete league tables with team positions and statistics
- Match Stats: Dive into detailed stats, scores, and team lineups
- Worldwide Coverage: Coverage of major competitions including Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, and more
- Accurate & Reliable: Trust our up-to-date data from football-data.org API
- Dark Mode: Beautiful dark and light themes for comfortable viewing

LIVE MATCHES AND DETAILED STATS
Experience the thrill of football with live scores & stats, comprehensive league standings, and in-depth match analysis.
WORLDWIDE COVERAGE - LIVE MATCH SCORES

ACCURATE AND RELIABLE DATA
Trust in our accurate and up-to-date football data, sourced directly from football-data.org, one of the most reliable football data providers. We are dedicated to delivering the ultimate football experience straight to your fingertips.

Don't just watch the game – live it! Download CricFy TV : Live Score: Live Football Scores & Stats now and elevate your football fandom to a whole new level.
Data Source: All football data is provided by football-data.org API - a reliable and trusted source for football statistics and live scores.

Disclaimer: This app is made for football fans to follow live scores and statistics. The content in this app is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by any football league or organization. All data is sourced from football-data.org API.

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. Get unrivalled coverage of Europe's ultimate club football competition. The official UEFA Champions League app brings you the latest soccer news, scores, draws, live coverage, next-day video highlights and our free Fantasy Football game.
 
FOLLOW THE UEFA CHAMPIONS LEAGUE
 
- Get live minute-by-minute updates from every single match.
- With the live bracket, see the path to the final – and watch it update live as goals go in.
- Simulate scorelines and see how they might affect the knockout stages.
- Don’t miss a single goal thanks to real-time push notifications.
- Listen to live match commentary on the go.
- Review the goals in detail with next-day highlights for every match*.
- Get live match statistics for every game.
- Access all the fixtures and up-to-date standings.
- Read the latest football news and analysis from UEFA experts.
- Dive straight into the news that matters to you with our personalised home feed.
- Watch the live draws.
- Get a heads up with notifications for all kick-offs, confirmed line-ups and draws.
- Keep up to speed on each club thanks to in-depth form guides about the top teams in the Premier League, La Liga, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Analyse individual team pages, squads and player pages
- Have your say by voting for your Player and Goal of the Week after each matchday.
 
EXPLORE THE ARCHIVES
 
- Access all-time player statistics: everything from the top goalscorer to the most yellow cards.
- Access all-time club statistics and results: everything from the most titles to the most goals conceded.
- Browse stats and videos from past winners such as Real Madrid, Liverpool, Barcelona, Ajax, AC Milan, Manchester United, Juventus, Bayern Munich, Chelsea and more.
- Watch match highlights from past seasons. 
- Watch highlight compilations curated by UEFA experts.
 
PLAY FANTASY FOOTBALL
 
- Play our free Fantasy game and pick your UCL dream team from Europe’s best soccer stars, including players from La Liga, the Premier League, Serie A and the Bundesliga.
- Spend your €100m budget wisely and score points based on your players’ real-life performances.
- Compete against your friends by creating and joining leagues.
- Check player stats to make the best selection decisions.
- Join leagues with other supporters from your club. If you’re a Real Madrid fan, compete against other Real Madrid fans. If you’re a Juventus fan, battle against other Juventus fans on the Juve fans’ leaderboard.
- Play Fantasy Football and live UEFA Champions League nights in a whole new way!

*Highlights available from midnight wherever you are in the world

Want to stay connected to all things Champions League?
Download the app for free now to get the definitive UEFA Champions League coverage, straight from the home of European football.

Experience SPORTS and Entertainment Anywhere, Anytime!
 
Stream on tablets and mobile devices wherever you are and dive into a world of high-quality live streaming that includes:
• Top global sports tournaments on beIN SPORTS channels.
• Blockbuster movies and trending series for unforgettable moments.
• Kids' channels to keep the little ones entertained.
 
A unique and all-inclusive experience that includes:
▪ High Quality Premium Channels, including 4K Channel.
▪ High speed streaming with low Latency (as less as 15 seconds latency from satellite service).
▪ Personalized Reminders and Push Notifications service to keep you updated on the latest matches.
▪ Cast to TV via Airplay and Chromecast to watch on the big screens.
▪ Adaptive Player with any connection speed for the best watching experience.
▪ Quality Selector ranging from Full HD to Data Saver.
▪ Interactive TV Guide showcasing live events and replays on all channels.

 
This service is exclusively available for users in the Middle East and North Africa region.

The HNA Handicaps & Tournament App provides any HNA-registered golfer with a convenient way to submit their scores either out on the course or after their round. These scores are submitted directly to the handicap server. The app also allows golfers to:
- Create and follow tournaments
- Calculate Course- and Playing Handicaps for themselves and others
- Add or invite affiliated and casual golfers
- Look up their own scoring history
- Look up the scoring history of fellow golfers
- Capture scores hole by hole

Additionally, HNA Premium is available through an in-App purchase, of an annual subscription, offering subscribers the ability to:
- View hole-by-hole stats, such as Fairways in Regulation, Greens in Regulation, and Putts Per Round
- View course stats, such as the number of birdies, pars and bogeys they have recorded
- View national rankings, to see where they stand in various categories
- View live leaderboards
- Follow friends and track their scores
 

If you are not currently a member of a golf club affiliated to GolfRSA, you can now create a profile and, once registered, enter tournaments and capture your rounds.
